name: Fax Doctor
description:
This was originally going to be made for a games factory jam but I was too drunk throughout to produce something playable so I've uploaded it as a semi broken concept.

It's a comical theme hospital / papers please inspired game where the player must correctly diagnose and treat patients without ever seeing them.

The game is very dark and only ever uses 3 colours. There was also a theme of Waffle do i took that to mean talking too much hence the long faxes. It is currently just about playable but doesn't last too long at all and can't be classed as a game quite yet.

have fun!
